Reviews.Content: While I'm happy with the TV itself the stand that it comes with makes me feel that at any moment it's going to fall over!. For a TV this size it needs to have a sturdier stand. That's why I gave 4 out of 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, a couple problems that I list here.
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Overall this tv met my expectations and is very good. I've had problems adjusting color to make blu-ray movies look good, however. On preset picture settings it won't let me adjust all but the custom ones, saying all 8 picture settings have been used. I plan on calling customer service to try to fix that. Also, there is an Amazon Instant Video button on the remote and it is listed in the apps on the tv, but when you click on either the screen just goes black. This TV is not listed in Amazon Instant Video compatible TV list. I think that is pretty misleading to put a button for it on the remote when it is not really an option. Netflix plays pretty well and I haven't had any troubles other than the ones listed. I think this is a good tv and would recommend it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Just want I am looking for
Reviews.Author: Ming Hung Cho "Ming"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent. The reason I'd take 1 star off the rating is because there is no build-in browser and Amazon instant video app is terrible. I know not all "Smart TV" shipped with a browser. But it'd be awesome to have it, don't you agree?Also the remote controller is annoying sometime. You have to really point it towards TV to operate.With that been said, I'll definitely buy my next TV from VIZIO again.

Reviews.Title: Amazing apps and a great picture
Reviews.Author: Robert Guyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use as a bedroom set and I can't recommend it enough!  Great picture and the apps are great.  You have all of the major streaming services and they all work very well.The picture is very good and required minimal calibration to get it right.  Can't say enough good things about the set.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Christopher A. Fleming "Chris F"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my LG TV. I figured it was time for a smart TV, and you cannot go wrong with this for the price. Amazing picture, and I love the super slim bezel. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: My gorgeous neighbor Mike purchased this TV
Reviews.Author: Charles William Sanderson
Reviews.Content: TITANFALLTHIS TV IS GREAT! I WOULD HAVE HIM PURCHASE AGAIN! FAST DELIVERY AND EVERYTHING TOO! FIVE STARS FOR MIKE AND HIS TV!

Reviews.Title: A very good choice for budget and none budget setups
Reviews.Author: Tradien
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised when I calibrated this TV.  Great blacks, very good colors and even back lighting. Compared to my calibrated Panasonic Plasma, it does very well (Not as good, but not far off). The sound is actually good for a panel this thin. I would recommend to anyone looking for a great TV that offers low cost operation, great picture and good smart TV features.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Linda Banko-Ortiz
Reviews.Content: Great picture and we love it.  Easy to move around the house . We are very satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Marcus Fenix
Reviews.Content: 100% satisfied, all the features, easy to setup, great picture. My Xbox One looks amazing on this TV. Highly recommended!!

Reviews.Title: Vizio is a high quality flat screen TV
Reviews.Author: Joe P
Reviews.Content: Exceptional picture quality, ultra easy set-up, fast delivery of the order, wifi, fair price, Vizio reputation! This is our 6th Vizio, all still working very well with zero complaints.

Reviews.Title: Still Not compatible with AMAZON PRIME INSTANT VIDEO????
Reviews.Author: Coleen Matuska
Reviews.Content: Great smart tv......lots of apps.....they all work, but amazon prime still hasn't developed a compatible INSTANT VIDEO app.to work with this tv. Good price....must be popular since most retailers are sold out.

Reviews.Title: First HD TV - perfect!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Fultz
Reviews.Content: All of my friends and family have high end televisions so I finally gave in and got this one.  I have had it for just over 2 weeks at the time of writing it and I love it.  the picture is super clear and the dim function when there is low levels of light in the room is so ingenues and perfect for when you are just sitting up late to watch a scary movie without the kids in the room.  The setup was self guided and super easy to do.  the apps that are built in are great.  I love that I do not have to have my play station turned on to watch Netflix anymore - I can just watch it straight on the TV!  and the picture when watching blue-rays... oh my is it clear.  My father as a 50+ inch LG and swears by them - but this is clearer than his TV and he is jealous!  I recommend this to anyone that wants a super clear picture and the versatility to do more with their electronics.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV but can't get WIFI to work
Reviews.Author: Computer illiterate in Chicago
Reviews.Content: I like everything about the tv except for the remote and WIFI setup.  We have numerous devices and TV's in our home that we are able to connect wirelessly through our Linksys E2500 router.  However, no matter what I do I cannot get this TV to connect.  Our kids like to access Netflix and this could be a deal breaker for us if we can't come up with a fix.  Sounds like many others here have not had an issue so not sure what the problem with ours is.

Reviews.Title: New size smart TV. Good features. Great picture.
Reviews.Author: Baltojeff
Reviews.Content: This new version of the E series Vizio's just came out and I was very curious to try out the new LED back light that was not edge-lit. The picture on this TV is great overall. You do have to work through the settings to get what you are after, as some of the "enhancements" can really get in the way of the picture. However, it is less intrusive than my last Samsung. Once I found the settings I liked, I was very pleased.The Smart features are easy to access. Netflix, Hulu and others are just a click away. Even the YouTube casting feature was a bonus. Now I can move my Chromecast to a dumb TV in the other room.The unit is much, much lighter than I expected (weight-wise). To the point that I had to rig a safety cable to the wall in case a cat or child were to give it a slight tug. The bezel is also very narrow and almost disappears entirely.Downsides are few, but there. The stand doesn't raise the TV up from what it's sitting on very much, so keep that in mind. Also, audio quality is average at best. It doesn't distort and will get moderately loud (certainly enough to hear), but there is just no bass or fullness at all. Suggest supplementing it with a sub as I did.Happy with my purchase overall. Even bought a second smaller Vizio smart TV on the basis of this one.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with Vizio E480i TV
Reviews.Author: denyl
Reviews.Content: Very good TV for price.  Excellent picture, reasonably good sound, nice features, including web connection.  Very nice appearance, slim boarder, easy setup.  Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Perfect picture & sound
Reviews.Author: Magascat
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the smart TV by VIZIO. The sound is amazing even without surround sound. The picture became perfect after setting them to my liking which was vivid. A low price for a great tv .. super value product & friendly phone service to help you set it up, also it has the instrution book down loaded already to the tv &  it is super easy to follow .

Reviews.Title: HDMI Not working property, Sound but no Picture
Reviews.Author: pamela parks
Reviews.Content: I like the look of this tv and the apps, unfortunately after a few days the HDMI ports were not working properly.  Although connections were in tightly, would receive "no signal" message on screen.  After 29 days of having TV all I could get was sound but no picture.  Amazon is replacing TV.  Hoping it was just this particular TV and the replacement will workout.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I had a vizio before and it was great so I decided to get another  and this new one is very nice easy to operate and I love that it has a sleep timer  ...  I never realized how hd was so good till I got this tv with the better pixels and the brightness ...

Reviews.Title: first vizio tv - no amazon video
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Rizvi
Reviews.Content: so far it's great no issues.the color profiles are pushed to the max on most settings. so they can look really washed out in bright scenes or where there is alot of red on the screen.i tweaked them and picture looks great!4 stars cause no amazon video app yet. there is a button on the remote but it just says that vizio and amazon are working on a solution. no answer from either on on when it will get done.smh you'd think they would have made sure it was working before shipping the tv to the world.

Reviews.Title: price match
Reviews.Author: jamar
Reviews.Content: I placed my order on the 7th and not scheduled to receive till the 14th however I would like to share before purchasing to email about price match. Before my order the tv was 728. But after emailing about price match and receiving my prime discount. The total was 598 which is a steal for this television. ...

Reviews.Title: 48" - Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: gamer2008
Reviews.Content: Bullet points for people needing info:1. The stand for the 48" is perfect.  Just remember to read the directions ;-)2. It has a glossy screen.3. It is NOT a true 120Hz.  It has an "effective" 120Hz refresh rate. It's really a 60Hz trying to be a 120Hz. It didn't bother me enough to want to return it.4. It has no external power button (at least that I could find).  Without the remote, you're screwed.3 & 4 are why I gave it 4 not 5 stars.Now for the complete review:I received mine a day late and yes, it was Amazon's fault (they didn't get it on the truck on time - you'd think since I'm a Prime member they'd do it right). Got an extra month on my Prime membership for the late delivery though.  Box came in pretty good condition from FedEx (small ding on the top but didn't penetrate the box). It comes in the normal box you'd get from a brick'n'mortar store and not double boxed.I had read a previous review about the screws for the stand being too short. I'm not sure if the stand is quite the same as the 55", but the stand for the 48" is perfect.  I had actually gone out and purchased the longer screws after reading that review....then I read the directions: there's a slot in the bottom where the base slides in to and the screws were the correct size.  DOH! Typical male 'I don't need no instructions' attitude lol. So, if you own the 48" don't worry..the stand is fine.Setting up is pretty easy.  Connected to my WiFi no problem. On screen keyboard is horrible to use (as most are). It does suck that you have to accept a Yahoo! internet terms of service, BUT you don't have to register any personal information.The TV picture is AMAZING! Like others have said, it does remind me of a plasma.  Played Iron Man 2, Thor: DW, Avengers and Skyfall through it and the action sequences were just as clear as any other 120Hz (but without the 'soap opera' look you get with 120's)Streamed Netflix just fine. Haven't tried the other services.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: A. Vail "Asniva"
Reviews.Content: Pros:Big ScreenLightweightClear PictureGreat soundCan turn off the power indicator(Seriously, that tiny light can be very bright in a dark room)Manual is on screenQuick setupNetflix, Amazon Prime, and YouTube appsThree HDMI hook ups(My last TV only had two so I had to switch between my three devices that used a HDMI cord)Cons:There are very few apps and it has not made my Roku obsolete due to this.Overall it is a great tv and I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: e480i 120 hz
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: this tv is amazing,this tv replaced my old vizio which was starting to have problems this is a the best tv i think i have ever had i did alot of research befor deciding on this tv and i must say vizio makes some of the best tv on the market today olot of people say that they are entry level but i just dont see how you could get much better than this.package arrived in great condition and the pilot guys were very nice and helpful. would recomend this product and this seller to anyone that wants a great tv without having to  break the bank

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Josh Marshall
Reviews.Content: I picked this TV up after a storm messed up the hdmi board on my last one. The picture looks great on this TV. There is no SOE. It is bright and clear. The 4 HDMI in ports allow me to have xbox, ps3, ps4 and cable hooked up. All of these out a common optical or hdmi for sound to whatever audio source you use. The speakers are decent for flat tv speakers, nothing special but they are loud enough to hear in a large living room with two kids. The price is great for such a large TV and I have never had issues with the three vizios I have owned.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: Perfect TV for my kitchen.  Has a great display and a good price too.  Smart TV functions as expected and is a very nice feature to have.  Would recommend this TV to others.

Reviews.Title: My first Vizio TV and probably my last.
Reviews.Author: Jeff "Jeff"
Reviews.Content: I really wanted to like this TV. All the reviews I read were great, and the picture quality is excellent, but it's only been 1 day and the TV is completely unresponsive. I tried a factory reset (unplug and hold down the power button for 30 seconds, then plug back in) but that didn't work.  Sending it back. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Have The CPU Power To Run Its Own Apps Properly
Reviews.Author: B Hector
Reviews.Content: I like the TV itself. It's a good deal. The picture quality is decent and for the price, great. So if you're not concerned with Netflix or Youtube, the TV is probably a 5. The picture is not perfect when compared to high end TV's, it's awfully good for $700.I bought the TV because I wanted an upgrade. As part of that upgrade, I wanted a TV with built-in wifi and apps. This was a major concern for me. Because of that, I must give the TV a 2. While the signal on the wifi is great, the TV simply doesn't have the processing power to handle its own apps effectively. Both Netflix and Youtube have frozen up on me. One of those times, I couldn't even power off the TV without physically unplugging it. I understand that, at $700, you can't have everything, but we're not talking about lag. We're talking catastrophic failure.

Reviews.Title: Wireless very difficult
Reviews.Author: Todd E. Ball "NeuroLeptic"
Reviews.Content: Unless you are very network savvy I wouldn't count on the wireless.I have a cisco (Linksys) router that works with all my devices such as xbox1, xbox 360, ipad2, ipad air, iphone5, Samsung galaxy s4 with no problem....HOWEVER with this TV I have been on tech support several times already and have yet to connect this tv properly.I must say the tech support is all American and very nice.  I was told this TV doesn't have a range of more than 35 ft from router.  My TV was in this distance and still had trouble locating the connection.  When I had a good connection it wouldn't download.  I was told the TV would only connect to a router with TKIP security and that ports 80 and 443 must be open.  If this sounds complicated to you...then I suggest not buying this TV for it's "SMART" feature.  When it comes to ease of the wireless function this TV is just plain dumb.On top of all that...I have not been impressed with the picture quality much either.  I was using a Panasonic plasma in this room (the room is a very dark room) and I was much more impressed with that TV even though it is about 5 years old.I'm going to play with getting this connected a little longer and if it doesn't improve then I'm returning it to the store.I'll update this if I find things to be any better than 1 star.

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality, good Youtube app but Amazon instant video app doesn't have watchlist!
Reviews.Author: Jerry@NewJersey
Reviews.Content: Just installed TV yesterday and played for a few hours.  Picture quality is good.  Sound quality is okay.  I like the Youtube app which can pair with my iphone and ipad.My main complaint is on the Amazon instant video app which lacks some major features such as watchlist, mobile device pairing, watch history, etc.  I am hoping this can be improved soon.  I am not sure if my TV would auto download the updated version of apps or not.I had two instances that the TV went off during the streaming in the first couple hours.  I don't know if it's me pressing buttons too fast or what.  But it didn't happen anymore since last night. I hope it won't happen again because I liked the TV video quality.

Reviews.Title: E550i-B2
Reviews.Author: Colin
Reviews.Content: This is a first !!! Purchased this SAME TV from Sam's Club... and also available at Walmart..... for $100 less. This is a Wonderful television!!! Not sure WHY I received a Special email.... wherein it was $100 MORE.This television is THE best I have seen and/or used... and I gotta say - I am very picky.Warning - if you go to Walmart - make SURE you look at the box... they try to give you the "A0" - 2013 model... NOT the same as the B2. Sams has the B2 in stock. Odd.Best TV ever..... and I lovvvve my tv's!!!!!Just remember that info.  :)

Reviews.Title: smart tv
Reviews.Author: John Ellis
Reviews.Content: Very good picture and easy to setup.  I like the fact it has wireless internet with popular applications such as Netflix and flkr.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Amy L. Poole "seasidediva"
Reviews.Content: vizio 42 inch smart tv is wonderful and easy to set up.  connected to wifi itself!!!order it, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with flaws
Reviews.Author: M. Lo
Reviews.Content: First let me start with the bad. Besides needing alot of calibration to get a great picture, I have noticed the set has debris in between the LCD and Backlight layers. They appear as black dots. I have received two of these sets from amazon and they both have this problem but in different areas of the screen. They are only noticeable when there is a bright picture displayed on the screen. If you have purchased this tv, I suggest putting a bright image on the screen and looking at all areas of the screen for these spots. I do not think they are dead pixels, but more likely debris from the manufacturing process. Besides this problem which is more annoying then anything, the tv does make up for it. The speakers sound good and are loud enough to fill a room. Once calibrated, color reproduction is pretty good, and the local dimming produces inky blacks that other LCD tvs arent able to produce. Set up was a snap and having a dedicated Netflix button on the remote is awesome. I found the remote to be VERY clicky, which is something I like. The tv is thin and light, and very easy to mount to a wall. This tv looks great with the Xbox one as well as the PS4. Overall for the price you cant go wrong. My only nitpick are those little black spots in the screen, but besides that it is a great tv. I would give it a 5 , but Vizio needs to do something about there Quality Control first.

Reviews.Title: Very nice unit
Reviews.Author: Old Lady "cat"
Reviews.Content: I like it a lot. We have a bigger one at our winter home and.we love it so we got one for our summer home.

Reviews.Title: What a great experience!
Reviews.Author: Rawley H. Watson, III
Reviews.Content: We had the need for a new TV with very specific deminsions.  Although we had never owned a Vizio before, our son loves his.  We took a chance.The set was as described.  The color is amazing and, within a very short time, had Amazon Prime and Netflix up and running.  Turn down the light and it's theater quality.Delivery by Amazon was on time and flawless.

Reviews.Title: Great price, nice picture, but there are a few things worth nit picking
Reviews.Author: Joshua D.
Reviews.Content: I bought this television after a friend recommended Vizio products and I noticed the great price listed on Amazon. After a day of having it, I've learned that while it does have a great picture, there are two things that are quite distracting:1) DO NOT set this up anywhere where you run the risk of "glare." I have a very bright living room and I've found this creates a MASSIVE amount of glare on the television screen. My last TV had hardly any glare when it sat in the very same spot, where the Vizio's glare is borderline unbearable.2) There are SLIGHT background pixelation issues when there's "movement" during whatever show you're watching. I was watching NFL Network in HD and I noticed whenever they cut to action shots during games, the crowd/background would get a little pixelated. Honestly, overall I would say that for a "High Definition" television, I was a little disappointed at the quality of the picture as I flipped through the channels. The 4-year-old Philips I had previously seemed to have a slightly clearer picture.I still give this three starts because overall the picture still is decent; the colors are great and when there's not "movement" the quality of the picture is fantastic. Also, for the price it's a pretty good deal overall. However, I do admit that there is a part of me that's tempted to return it and upgrade to a Samsung or LG because when you're dropping several hundred dollars on a television you really want to "love" it and not feel "meh" about it.

Reviews.Title: Go America!
Reviews.Author: pete card. "Certero"
Reviews.Content: I gave the chance to this brand because I found out that is an American brand. I was born and raise in Venezuela but I live  and have my family here and I am a Proud Citizen of this Great and beautiful Country. Let me tell you that this TV is an awesome piece of work. I am so happy I choose this brand. The technology on this TV is state of the art. I just bought a Vizio sound bar and works great too. Give the opportunity to this American Brand you will not regret it. Made in America! We have to support our products and more when they are high quality products better than others. Go for it.

Reviews.Title: I only have one complaint...
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: And that is that I didn't have enough room for a bigger model. The Vizio 55" E550i-B2 has excellent picture quality for it's price range. The sound is great for an LED tv. My Xbox One looks phenomenal. I don't use it for internet apps so I can't speak to that but I did try playing movies from my pc and it was hit or miss. Some files played fine while others had audio and no video. Some wouldn't play at all. But that is probably the fault of my network connection or how the files are encoded. Just thought I would mention it, but that's not why I bout the television. The audio and video are superb and I would recommend this television to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Amazon instant video DOES work! And supports Amazon Prime videos too
Reviews.Author: Michael Switzer
Reviews.Content: Just bought this TV yesterday from BB. Love it! Light as can be. Super thin? Great picture as everyone has been saying. And i want to say even though the amazon description said amazon instant video isn't available, I can confirm that the one I just got on June 6 2014 does have the update and the app works great. There is even a quick access button on the remote to pull up amazon, netflix, and m go. I was worried that it would only support amazon video on demand like my TiVo does and that it wouldn't play amazon prime videos. But I can happily say that for amazon prime members, it plays all the free movies you get with your subscription and also any you have purchased. That was a great surprise since not even my TiVo will allow me to play the free streaming Prime videos. In summary, I've only had it a day, but love it.

Reviews.Title: Great t.v.
Reviews.Author: R.Chavez
Reviews.Content: Hello I purchased this for a upgrade to a bigger screen and never looked back it's picture quality is excellent sound is good but it might be wise to get one of those sound bars to enhance that it's profile is sleek overall great television for the price so if looking for something new check it out Vizio can complete and hold it's own against the other brands.

Reviews.Title: Nice set for a bedroom, after firmware update.
Reviews.Author: Nate Perry
Reviews.Content: This TV works fairly well. It has a nice picture but I had to turn the dynamic contrast off because it just makes the picture look weird. It attempts to keep the contrast ratio at its optimum level by raising and lowering the back-lighting based on the scene of what you are watching and it really makes what you are watching look strange. Fortunately, you can turn it off in the options and it looks much better. Since it is a smaller television I don't really notice much difference between my 1080p TV in the living room and the 720p of this one.My only complaint was that when I got it Amazon Prime Video was not working. When you went to activate it it said it was "being improved" and gave a link. However, searching through Amazon gave no clue what to do. I finally found a forum that stated you had to update the firmware in order for Amazon Prime Video. Why they don't come already with the latest version is why it lost a star. I had to find a secret mode called "service check" and it took days for the system to finally update. After the update everything seems to be in working order now.Wifi works great.Netflix works great.All the other functions I have no really experimented with.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my office
Reviews.Author: weather dude "wxdude"
Reviews.Content: What's not to like?  Arrived earlier than expected.  Virtually set itself up.  Linked up to my router on the first try.  Apparently recognized my cable remote without even inputting TV code.  Perfect HD picture with HDMI connection and no adjustments or tuning necessary.  Sound is undistorted with good volume.  Light weight.  The open base allows placement on top of cable box without blocking vent, which I found to be a useful space saving advantage.  Great price.  It is a basic set with minimum inputs which might be a drawback if you wish to add peripherals, but I don't need them.  I haven't yet tried the "smart" features but they look straight forward.

Reviews.Title: Mostly Good, Beware of the Base.
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: Be very careful with the base.  I don't know if I got a one-off rarity, but the base simply fell apart.  The metal brackets on the TV side are held in with plastic; this plastic on my TV completely broke allowing the metal brackets to come loose.  Fortunately I noticed the TV wobbling when I turned a box fan on and realized I had a problem, and corrected the situation by requesting a replacement.  Who knows how long the new one will last, but it buys me time to get a wall mount or other way of stabilizing the TV.

Reviews.Title: Never buy it!
Reviews.Author: Nilufar Baratova "Nina"
Reviews.Content: I can't count how much issues that TV has. It turns off and on whenever it wants. You can imagine how irritating it can be if you are watching a movie or news. It took their technician forever to come to my apartment and fix it. Guess what now it freezes from time to time and my husband has to literally turn it off from cable and turn on again. The worse product I ever got.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Kynetec
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to use in a conference room as a large monitor. Seems to work great so far.

Reviews.Title: True Value Here!
Reviews.Author: GBR
Reviews.Content: Great value. Only problem is having to manually adjust screen/picture fit when on non HD channels.Auto adjust would make perfect.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 24 inch LED TV
Reviews.Author: Pragmatic Guy
Reviews.Content: Not a bad set for little money. Picture could be a little brighter and viewing angle is small but that's with all LED sets and that's why my main set is a plasma. I have a 42" Vizio in my bedroom and that seems to be a much better product but maybe that has to do with screen size. Amazon promised two day delivery and they were spot on.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Charles Wesley
Reviews.Content: Love the TV, great size for small barracks room. Love the feature that I can watch what's on tablet on the TV screen.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO Customer Service is awful
Reviews.Author: Ritu
Reviews.Content: My TV had some dead pixels. It was still within warranty period. However I could not furnish a receipt and they refused to honor the warranty despite the fact that they could verify from the serial # that it was truly under warranty. First they said they needed a pic of the problem, then i called again and said they need a photo of the Vizio symbol, then I called they said they need the serial #, then I called they said they need to know where I purchased it from, how much I purchased it for, and the date I purchased...i reminded them...I don't have the original receipt and don't know all that information. Very frustrating that the criteria for warranty service kept changing...so basically they look for ways to get out of warrantying your television. The irony is, it is a low budget brand, and so you will actually need the warranty more then you would if you purchased with a reputable brand. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture and Sound
Reviews.Author: Gary Mix
Reviews.Content: TV was delivered yesterday. I got the 32 inch version for my workout room. Took about 10 minutes to unbox and get set up. Works flawlessly with amazon prime app. Was watching Stargate Atlantis in HD, streamed from Amazon in about 5 minutes after set up. Picture is great.The sound is great up to about 70% volume. After that the bass begins to distort but 50% is pretty loud and the sound quality is outstanding at that level. If you are going to set this up in a large living room I would suggest the optional sound bar, but a bedroom or workout room this is plenty for.Over all Im very happy with this TV. I will most likely get another for the bedroom to replace my old one.

Reviews.Title: BUY THIS TV
Reviews.Author: Ray C
Reviews.Content: Picture is great. I have had/ watched many TV's. This is comparable with any other TV in the market. what is important is the 1080P and 120Hz vs 720p and 60Hz. Dont waste your money on a Samsung that is hundreds more- buy this one and use the extra money to take your lady out on the town.

Reviews.Title: Best investment
Reviews.Author: renee/aka snug
Reviews.Content: I really love my purchase especially what I paid beautiful picture nice and clear wonderful sound just love no complaints haven't tested all the perks yet but will and will add comments at a later date

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied so far.
Reviews.Author: Eleanor Worden
Reviews.Content: So far, I am very pleased with it.  It was easy to get hooked up and the picture quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV's are great
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: This is my first Smart tv.  I am becoming used to it's features.  Some paid subscriptions to movie services are required to get the full use of the features.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: what?
Reviews.Content: I've been having a problem with the backlight if I don't press anything the tv will get really bright then really dark and it has bad lag when you try to use crackle it's pretty small and the speakers have a werid echo sound or something sounds like the bad sound you get when you go to the drive in.cost a lot but eh if you really need youtube in your bedroom it's a good Tv

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Mikenedge
Reviews.Content: I needed a TV to put in my son's room to watch netflix and play video games on.  We purchased the 24 inch model previously, so when I seen they had the 28 inch I was hooked.  It has Two HDMI inserts versus the 24 inch model.  I would say for install and including updates it was ready to go in about 10 minutes.  If I did have to say one con about it is the stand is a little cheap.  It didn't matter to me, because I was mounting it anyways.

Reviews.Title: This is my fifth Vizio
Reviews.Author: Mildred Zinaman
Reviews.Content: I love the the tv and enjoy the apps that I have. You have to play around with the colors to fit your eyes, other wise it is clear with a high definition cable. I received the first tv with the screen crack called and they send me the second one with in two days in good condition. A great tv for it's value.

Reviews.Title: Vizio delivers again
Reviews.Author: James Masco
Reviews.Content: I have been replacing my dated televisions over the past few years and just replaced the old RCA in my bedroom with this model.  it was assembled and running in all of 5 minutes. All 3 Vizio's are delivering high quality picture

Reviews.Title: Love our Smart TV
Reviews.Author: H. jones "Pretty In Ink"
Reviews.Content: I'm glad my husband told me about this brand. My parents have a smart TV and we saw they enjoyed it so we decided to buy one. This was a great buy. The only negative would be the remote. It is very 'clicky' sounding when you push buttons so it gets to be annoying. I do wish we could search google while on the TV. It does have a bunch of apps, but google was not one of them.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: George R. Pope
Reviews.Content: The unit has met our expectations, good picture, sound and reasonably easy to navigate through using the remote and the supplied aps. Highlight of the TV is the built in WiFi which eliminated an external unit to gain access to NetFlix, You Tube, etc. Overall, the set is worth the purchase price.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Keith A Peterson
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear picture on this television.  I have the 60 inch in the family room and the picture on it helped me pick this smaller Vizio model for the living room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jackie Chiles
Reviews.Content: Perfect for our needs. Beautiful picture, easy to set up, light weight - very light weight, and low energy use.

Reviews.Title: Would be perfect with working Amazon App
Reviews.Author: The Fickerts
Reviews.Content: To be fair, Amazon noted that their prime app no longer works on this model TV and it should be receiving an update here soon, hopefully.  This is the first "Smart TV" we've owned as we've relied on set top boxes on our other Televisions.  We are looking to ditch cable soon and this TV had built in apps for Netflix, Hulu Plus, and Amazon Prime.  We wish there was a 26" model as 24" is a little small for our space, but 28" is a little too much so we decided to get the smaller version.  However set up with our wi-fi and over the air antenna was easy and simple.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: danny r simmons
Reviews.Content: Bought this for grandchild room , It works very well and having the built in wifi is a plus. Good TV

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: G. Liao
Reviews.Content: This was my first purchase on store and I am pleased so far. I have only had it a few days and have not got my HD box through my cable provider yet, but the TV alone on a normal box is really nice. It has a good sound and color and knows with my HD box it will be even more amazing. It just the right size for my room. I am very pleased as it is easy to hook up and set up as well.

Reviews.Title: A Great Small TV For My Bookcase
Reviews.Author: William S Cameron
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Great picture and easy to set-up - in five minutes I had it connected to my home WiFi with no additional equipment to buy. Great price and great delivery time plus very easy to order from your very well designed website. No I'm not an employee of Amazon and I don't own any of its shares.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: D.R.Weaver
Reviews.Content: What a great buy at a great price. Quick shipping, even to Hawaii. We love it. thank you so much. works with all our electronics. PS3 and 4. ROKU, Amazon Fire TV. Almost sets it's self up.

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Content: I looked at several products before buying this, and for the price and value its at, this product is absolutely great. Loved it!

Reviews.Title: This TV is awesome.
Reviews.Author: sam adams
Reviews.Content: Easy set up right out of the box. Nice looking TV with a great picture clarity and even the sound from the internal speakers is quite good. Easy to use remote and set up was a breeze once hooked up to the cable box. This is my second Vizio TV and both have been excellent. Highly recommend Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for Quality and Value

Reviews.Title: great tv

Reviews.Content: Bought this one to replace the 46" Toshiba I had in the living room (that one went to the summer place) and I really like the set. Reviews.Title: AWESOME TV

Reviews.Title: Good Picture/Slow Response Time

Reviews.Title: Vizio 23 inch
Reviews.Author: Leticia Hollingsworth
Reviews.Content: I did like it at first but for some reason Netflix does not work properly on this TV.  I would like to know if anyone else has had this problem.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Weisner
Reviews.Content: For the price this TV has exceeded my expectations. Great picture and features for a basic but effective smart TV.

Reviews.Title: Wow.
Reviews.Author: James Halligan
Reviews.Content: This is the first Smart TV I've owned and I'm really impressed.  Netflix works flawlessly.  I can stream movies from my computer using Plex and the build-in media player.  The picture quality is absolutely insane, even using my low-def cable box.  HIGHLY recommend this set.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Michael F Estinville
Reviews.Content: I have the same model in 55" and this one is just as good. Great picture quality and sound. Was purchased as a Mother's Day gift and my mom LOVES it.

Reviews.Title: Vizio Smart TV
Reviews.Author: phyllis weiser
Reviews.Content: The TV is exactly what I was looking for and at a great price.  It has features that are usually reserved for more expensive models/brands.  I couldn't be more satisfied with my purchase and would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a smaller TV.

Reviews.Title: never had a better tv!
Reviews.Author: crrowe "crrowe"
Reviews.Content: this tv fits perfict it has a great picture controles are easy enough to use and the sound is great. i would lower it a half star just because sometimes using the wifi for movies gets a little messed up but usually only for a second.

Reviews.Title: 24-inch smart tv
Reviews.Author: iPhone 5 black holster
Reviews.Content: this tv came in when it was scheduled and works great. It has a very good picture and all i had to do was plug it in and it connected to my wifi without any problems. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Audio volume defective.
Reviews.Author: John Richards
Reviews.Content: TV's sound was very "tin-ie" and volume control was defective: the volume would start low & increase for first 5-10 seconds. This occurred for each ad & program change, not just at power on on channel change. I returned the set; Amazon made the return very easy & uncomplicated.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and delivery speed!
Reviews.Author: Roy Domke
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the performance of this VISIO Smart LED TV. The only thing that could be improved is the sound quality, probably due to its small rear facing speakers.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for small room
Reviews.Author: Shayne
Reviews.Content: Picture is great, sound is not the best but I only bought the tv for the picture quality and apps. However, it looks too small for my room so I will be returning it for the larger 28"

Reviews.Title: 32 inch VIZIO HDTV is Excellent
Reviews.Author: R. Tillotson "amateur pianist"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this VIZIO TV for our bedroom to replace an old Audiovox 24 inch set that finally gave up the ghost. This VIZIO TV is the third one of this brand that we have purchased and they are all excellent. We're using this new set with rabbit ears antenna since we don't have cable in the bedroom. The picture quality is outstanding. I have connected it to Wi-Fi since we do have that available and connecting it was very simple while following the on-screen set up directions. About the only thing I can think of that I don't like is the remote. That is because the buttons are a bit too small and it's difficult to tell which end is up due to the design. This is very annoying when using it in the dark and can't feel which end is pointing at the TV. VIZIO really needs to redesign their remotes as they are the same design for all three of my VIZIO sets.

Reviews.Title: She Loves it
Reviews.Author: Scott D. Wozniak
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a friend and she loves it. It has all the features she needs and provides a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Ok I guess.
Reviews.Author: Stephanie R.
Reviews.Content: This TV seemed like a good value and I suppose it is but I have had to call tech support 3 times in the last few months because the apps won't work. I have had to completely reset my TV each time. Super annoying.

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Fred Dennis
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these a few months ago. I now own 2 48" Vizio TV's and 1 60" Vizio TV. The color is super and no problems. I've had the 60 inch about a year.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: David Sokol
Reviews.Content: Definitely worth the price - sharp picture, nice thin bezel.You can definitely tell the difference between this and last year's model, so pony up for the newer one. The 120hz refresh rate does make a difference when watching sports as the movements are much more fluid. You can tell on older TVs that movements tend to pixelate a bit with lower refresh rates.Cons: blacks aren't as defined as some higher end models but you'd be spending 2x this price to get one of those. You can occasionally see different shades of black and grey when it should perhaps be smoother.Unless you're an extreme TV buff, this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Lois Cundiff
Reviews.Content: Unable to get out much and I do most of my shopping on line.  With the help of the ads in the Sunday paper I did price comparison.  This TV was just what I was looking for, at a good price, and delivered to my door.

Reviews.Title: its a great tv

Reviews.Title: Ditched the Samsung and got the Vizio
Reviews.Author: S Powers
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with my Vizio TV purchase.Prior to the Vizio I purchased a Samsung smart TV which turned out to be a total nightmare. The Samsung smart TV had major issues which required me to spend three hours on the phone with their technical support, even after the three hours they were never able to resolve the problem.  The Samsung TV had a smart hub issue that caused the TV to continually update every single time it was turned on and every time it would update it would lose all of the currently programmed settings that were on the TV.  It was a real hassle. I ended up shipping the samsung TV back.I ended up replacing it with the Visio which is perfect.After this experience I will never blindly trust a name brands like Samsung and I will give brands like Vizio a  fair chance going forward.Don't bother buying a Samsung go for the Visio and you'll be totally happy.

Reviews.Title: Great set for the money!
Reviews.Author: Brian Bubrick
Reviews.Content: Great TV! Easy to set up, connects to the Internet easily, great picture, cool features, and decent sound for a TV it's size.Only one small issue. Sometimes when turned on, it doesn't recognize the cable connection and says "not support". Gotta change the input back n forth n then it works. Weird, and maybe it just needs a firmware update but how am I supposed to know?Still a GREAT BUY

Reviews.Title: The best 32" in its price range
Reviews.Author: Brian Wallenstein "JACKOFHEARTS"
Reviews.Content: We compared a lot of 32" TVs for our bedroom but this one is the best. The picture quality is very vivid and crisp, it's incredibly light and is a Smart TV (for those who don't know, this basically means there are built-in apps on the TV so you don't need a PS3, AppleTV, or any device to watch Netflix, Amazon Prime, Hulu, etc.. these apps are built into the TV). Perfect for a bedroom or anywhere else you want a smaller sized TV. I carried this box with two fingers up the stairs to our apartment! Can't beat this TV for under $300.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amazonn girl
Reviews.Content: There are several things I like about this TV. 1) It comes with tech support.  2) It is very user friendly.  3) It has a manual right on the TV.  4) It has a very good picture.  5) I got an extended warranty that you can't beat.  6) Great price for a Smart TV.  I like it enough that I am going to order another one, 32 inch for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E550i was a great choice and had a reasonable price.
Reviews.Author: Jeri J. Steele "Jeri J Steele, Pioneer Inform...
Reviews.Content: This TV is sharp with excellent colors and lots of features.  The amazon prime interface isn't there yet but I'm looking forward to when that update arrives.  The speaker were adequate but we went and bought a Lg Sound bar just because we wanted more of theater like experience. You can't beat the price. I thought it might be an end of a model due to the lower price, but maybe it's that Amazon wanted to promote a product in their TV, either way, it was a great choice.  Recently we were Sam's and compared the models that they were showing and we thought the Vizio was the best. It made us feel better about our choice.

Reviews.Title: Perfect apartment tv
Reviews.Author: kewasssss
Reviews.Content: Good size, and we love using the apps.  I do wish the post for the stand came off, though, as we have it mounted on a wall.  The bottom part of the stand does come off, but the post sticking out a couple of inches may look strange for those who notice it.  Doesn't affect the function, though - it works well, and the picture is great!

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: It's a great tv it's in our bedroom so I don't watch it much but it delivers when I do!

Reviews.Title: great deal great buy
Reviews.Author: zmazing
Reviews.Content: great sound quality as well as the picture is great as well.i would recommend this TV to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Gr8 picture
Reviews.Author: Michael D. White
Reviews.Content: Needed ta replace my patio TV cause it was losing its degaussing ring. This is replacing a 26" tube TV and is gr8, it's takes up less room and has gr8 picture quality. Hooks up wifi and menus for Netflix and Amazon tv.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I got the 24 inch one and I'm enjoying it right now as I type this review. when I took it out of the box and then hooked everything up I noticed there wasn't any buttons for channel and volume control. only one button and that's for the power. to some this would be a bad thing (for any reason if the remote stopped working). if the remote stopped working you'd need to find a remote that works with this tv, a remote that works the input button because the remote on my DVR remote doesn't operate the input modes but it will control volume and power.you may need to clip some of the wire on the end that screws on the back of the tv, I had to do this to make a connection and so that it would screw on. if you need to do this take the smallest amount of cuts possible to make sure you don't cut too much wire.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Smittyh
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because it fit the space that the TV had to go.  We have been very pleased with everything about it and the price was within our budget.  Very good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price
Reviews.Author: scrub101
Reviews.Content: Specifically bought this TV for gaming as I recently bought a PS4. Picture looks incredible without any lag. My advice is to turn off all the "advanced picture" options as they add input lag. If you can, watch sports on 720P as there is minor ghosting when displayed in 1080i. (No cable box displays at 1080P). I Don't care for or use the "Smart" features this TV came with. My PS4 has all the apps I need. The only issue I had was the TV had a huge puncture hole in the back of the box. (had no time to dispute as the driver dropped it off and took off immediately). luckily there was no noticeable damage to the back of the TV. If the puncture was on the front of the box, it may have been a different story. All in all, this is a great TV for the price. ($10 off for Amazon Prime users).

Reviews.Title: High end product at a Value Price
Reviews.Author: SkS
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the new Vizio E500i-B1 smart HDTV. It was easy to set up the internet as well as connecting it to my DVD player and surround sound system. The picture is crisp and I love the small frame around the the outside. I don't think you can go wrong with this product.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but praise
Reviews.Author: David Stafford Jr.
Reviews.Content: Love.Love. Love this TV's color quality, sound and sharpness. It is a great value for the price. I would recommend Its a Great buy

Reviews.Title: Great product.
Reviews.Author: Shawn David Jacobson
Reviews.Content: The base is the only downside of this product. The product in general is amazing. Its,very slim and never gets warm no matter how long it gets left on. I watch alot of Netflix, and play alot of video games, this tv has terrific graphics, and I crisp clean image.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, sound mediocre.
Reviews.Author: Ken J
Reviews.Content: Great price for a set with a great picture.  Sound quality leaves a little to be desired. For $700 it was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Seems to be an excellent TV, but the stand is chintzy...
Reviews.Author: OIB lady "OIB lady"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV to replace an older Sony Trinitron unit that was about to expire. The first unit was delivered two days after the order was placed. When I opened the box, the screen was busted. To Amazon's credit, they sent a pick-up order to UPS and reordered a new unit as a replacement that day. When the replacement unit arrived, the flimsy base broke while I was connecting the cables. I bought a wall mount at Walmart and solved that problem. My impression is that this is an excellent TV. Nice apps and connects to the internet with a minimum of fuss. If it had a decent stand, I could rate it higher. Amazon Prime gets kudos for super customer service!!  I would recommend this TV to a friend with the proviso that a wall mount is needed...

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV

Reviews.Content: First flat screen TV purchase...it is unbelievable.  Picture is amazing and the 'smart' features are awesome.  Can't wait for football season...

Reviews.Title: just like a movie theater
Reviews.Author: Nicholas DeVincenzo
Reviews.Content: Sitting and enjoying this 55 inch TV and eating popcorn without the hassle of long lines is simply fun for me and the entire family.

Reviews.Title: Very nice SMART TV

Reviews.Content: Very nice.  Only downside is that you can't get Amazon Prime.  But it does get HuluPlus. Netflix and other streaming medias.  Amazon says they'll have a software update soon.  That works for me.  Very good price.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: mimithree
Reviews.Content: I love this T.V. Easy setup and great picture and features! I use it in my bedroom, but it's a large room.

Reviews.Title: I works fine with your Tube shows
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: It performed flawless.  The built in Wifi makes it very easy to project the your tube program you are viewing on IPad to the big TV loud and clear.

Reviews.Title: great TV!
Reviews.Author: Keith "wild mountain lass"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, well-designed controls, and a great value. This particular model is better than other Vizios, and much better than competitors in this price range.

Reviews.Title: So good, I bought another for my dad.
Reviews.Author: Peter K.
Reviews.Content: Pros:1. Picture is awesome. Best setting is calibrated mode. Standard mode appears washed out.2. Youtube streaming works great with WIFI as long as you have good signal  strength from your router.  (There is a signal strength check function on the TV.)  Amazed at how moving the router (which is in another room ) a foot to the right made in signal strength and picture quality.Cons:1. Owner's manual is bare bones. Had to figure out for myself how the Youtube app worked.  Google "Youtube pairing" for linking  your tv so you can stream videos.2. Some SD stations appear with a line of static at the top of the tv.  Some commercials on HD stations have a line of static too, so blame the station.  Selecting  the equivalent HD channel,  or , if none,  wide or zoom mode gets rid of this.3. Get tv straps (use bungy cords in a pinch) to hold the tv in place. It isn't stable. It weighs only 17 lbs, and can be easily tipped over. And it is fragile, if you are going to move it, grab it from the bottom not the top.4. The composite and component inputs are shared, so it's one or the other for one device. If you have lots of old equipment that still use these connections, get an external router for connecting multiple devices or upgrade to new devices.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E480i-B2 Reviewed
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Chaplin
Reviews.Content: This TV puts up a great picture. I am connected to the Internet through Wi-Fi & it works well. The Apps can be a bit slow to open but once open they work good. The 2 things that I don't like is that there is only 1 button for the Pwr on the side of the TV & so You have to do Everthing from the remote which I guess is ok. The other thing I found is that You have to aim the remote directly at the lower left of the screen or it doesn't respond. It is a IR Signal & really wish there was a option to use a RF Signal instead just like My Directv Remote but other than that I'm very happy with it & for the price You can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Great TV couldn't be happier.
Reviews.Author: whittony "Tony Whitaker"
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. This was our first foray into the smart TV Market and we bought it for our daughter in her room and she loves it. She is constantly listening to Pandora and watching netflix for kids on it. The remote is very well thought out and the shortcut keys make getting where you want to go a snap.

Reviews.Title: Everything ok

Reviews.Content: This led hdtv fulfilled all my requirements that i wanted so i recommend this product to another customers.thanks very much

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ricardo
Reviews.Content: For the price this TV brings great quality and value for money. I would certainly purchase another one of these.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: George Leibowitz
Reviews.Content: PLEASANTLY SURPRISED BY THE QUALITY. THE PICTURE IS SO GOOD THAT EVEN OLDER MOVIES APPEAR TO BE LIVE ACTION.I CAN EASILY GET TO MY NETFLIX ACCOUNT,HOOK UP MY COMPUTER WITH AN HDMI CABLE AND CONNECT TO THE INTERNET. I WAS A BIT DISAPPOINTED THAT I COULD NOT WIRELESSLY CONNECT MY COMPUTER TO THE TV, BUT MAYBE I JUST COULD NOT FIGURE IT OUT. I WENT ON LINE TO FIND OUT HOW BUT NO ONE REALLY SEEMED TO KNOW.

Reviews.Title: What a Picture
Reviews.Author: CoolRoberto
Reviews.Content: I chose a five star rating because of the quality picture I am enjoying. Also, the easy setup when it arrived. I really enjoy the smart TV feature and I recommend this model to anyone looking for perfection. Oh, I use it in my bedroom and I can hardly wait for FOOTBALL!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the Price
Reviews.Author: Rhiannon R
Reviews.Content: Couldn't bring ourselves to pay $1000+ to replace our small, aging Bravia flat panel. After some fairly extensive research, we decided on this TV and it is very good. The screen is large; the picture is sharp; it sips electricity sparingly; the viewing angles are generous; and the super-thin frame is barely noticeable. Our only complaint is that the settings that provide the deepest blacks and best contrast cause colors in the flesh-tone spectrum to shift to a much redder hue than they should be. Usually it only makes most actors/actresses look tan. Occasionally depending upon the lighting (in the video, not in the room) and the person, it can cause them to appear to be a nearly comical boiled-lobster red. My husband tried for about an hour to find a setting that would provide the good contrast without the lobster people but was unsuccessful. So occasionally we have a little laugh.Also worth noting - we had to pick this box up at the UPS facility. The box it ships in would not fit into the back seat of our midsize sedan (too tall to fit in the doors). We unpacked it from the shipping box and the retail box inside fit into the backseat just fine.

Reviews.Content: I have not really used the "smart TV features" as I have this hooked up to my Xbox One. But I will say the picture and response times are great. I am very pleased with this TV and I would recommend it to anyone looking to get a decent TV in this price range.

Reviews.Title: TV is great.

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv and after opening the box found the screen was cracked.  I went online and arranged for a return and replacement.  The replacement was sent out that day - next day delivery! - and they arranged for UPS to pick up the damaged item at the same time.  Absolutely fantastic service!  The tv itself is great.  Beautiful picture and pretty intuitive to set up.  Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great television.
Reviews.Author: Flakeswoman7
Reviews.Content: We received the Visio a few days late but it is a great television. I will look into another purchase very soon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jill Coston
Reviews.Content: We do love our TV, but can currently only give it 4 stars for the below reasons:1.  The Amazon Instant Video application does not currently work.  This is a 2014 model, and some regulatory changes were made in January 2014.  Until Amazon upgrades the application, it will not work.  As of May 7, 2014, it is still not working.  We are very disappointed, as we watched a lot of videos on Amazon.  We have to go to our older TV to watch Amazon until it is fixed on the 2014 model.2.  At first, it took quite a long time to stream videos from Netflix.  When I called Vizio customer support, they were not very helpful.  We were not having any other issues with electronic devices connecting to our wireless internet.  But I called our internet provider.  They were able to change the settings on our internet so that the connection was much quicker.  They were surprised that they actually had to revert back to an older setting to make a 2014 TV work properly.  Whatever they did, it works very fast now.3.  We have a smaller, older version of a Vizio TV, so the TV was very familiar to us.  Although, it sure would be nice if the remote was easier to use for typing in search items.  For some reason, I thought it came with a querty keyboard, but it does not.

Reviews.Title: 32" vizio TV
Reviews.Author: neil davis
Reviews.Content: so far all is going well!! this product was described perfect ! great picture and sounds great ! as always amazon & it's sellers are a great !! will do business again.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E480i-B2 - great value
Reviews.Author: David LaBedz "dml"
Reviews.Content: The E480i-B2 is a great value for the dollar. Narrow bezel, okay base, (yes it wobbles when you touch it). Some complain about the plasticky remote. The remote might look cheap, but it works. The user manual is the worst part of this TV. Had to call Vizio to get through set up where the manual is totally useless. The graphics used only give you hints of what to do, and the text is very generic.I will still have to call Vizio to get the TV hooked up the WiFi to enable the Smart TV functions.Good stuff, picture quality is great, no complaints about color saturation or whites and blacks. Colors look very good. Other comments tell you how to change color setting easily so I will not repeat anything here.Want an excellent 48inch or 55inch Smart TV?Get the Vizio E series.

Reviews.Title: Super easy to install
Reviews.Author: Susan E. Falk "apckrfan"
Reviews.Content: First off, to be clear - this product includes a stand. (I read differing answers in the Q&A; area, so I wasn't sure whether to expect one or not.)Installation was super easy, all I needed was a screw driver to secure the TV to the stand. That was it. I have a PS3 which thanks to the online user guide I activated easily, too.The picture is nice. I watched baseball and hockey my first night owning it and it was a great experience.

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Content: picture perfect

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my  expectations!
Reviews.Author: jadedtree
Reviews.Content: I was looking to replace my old enormous tv in our kitchen. Not too much to choose from  when looking for smart tvs in this size, so I wasn't expecting much. Especially on a budget. Never owned a Visio, but heard good thing about them. For the price and my Amazon points I gave it a shot. I'm glad I did! It's just what I was looking for. Picture is sharp viewing angles are good not just from straight on but from the sides and below too! Sound is better than I thought no need for sound bar, I was worried it was going to be muffled or overly tinny. It's perfect for a kitchen or any small room. Profile is really small, thin. And it almost all tv. Set up was so simple it recognized my network right away. I don't have cable so the apps were what I wanted it for. Make sure you have all your passwords ready and you'll be up and running In a matter of minutes.  Streaming is smooth, it works great! Bonus! Netflix button on the remote! And the remote is not awful, button are not too close together and easy to read. There's even controls at the top for streaming( ff/rw/pause/stop). I'm so impressed with the picture, even though it's not full HD, I'd consider Visio again if ever I need or could  afford a bigger tv.  You get a lot for a little finally. I'm pleasantly surprised!I should mention that I also have Uverse internet, and my wifi was easy to set up had no problems at all. Everything about this tv is easy to use. Not sure why the other reviewer had wifi issue. Highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: nice tv, great color, volume is good
Reviews.Author: db
Reviews.Content: we like this tv.  i am having a little trouble with the wifi part....mostly because i have not taken the time to see how it really works.  i would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: melissa chevalier
Reviews.Content: No issues with TV. Works just fine and was easy to hang. Would definitely recommend to friends and family looking for a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for an afforable price
Reviews.Author: Callie @ Sweet Fancy McGees
Reviews.Content: We were so pleased with this purchase. It was within our budget. The sound and picture are wonderful. It's a great tv for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Its a great tv for the price, packing good shipped quickly.
Reviews.Author: Ronald Bembry "ChrisBEE"
Reviews.Content: setup was super quick seem light weight compared to most. I use the netflix some but mostly let the xbox do it by voice command. good sharp picture for bedroom smaller room. I have two of these models now. there is even a setting to turn off the vizio led light. I think you will enjoy this TV for years Surge Protector. I lost one from dirty power or something.

Reviews.Title: Great smart TV at a bargain price.
Reviews.Author: Mark Palmer
Reviews.Content: The Vizio 40' smart tv has great color, easy to operate menu, built in apps and very adequate sound.  I highly recommend this unit to my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Joan Bondy
Reviews.Content: great product, very outstanding picture, and lots of options.  This product even comes with a build in internet receiver. thanks

Reviews.Title: great tv

Reviews.Content: After my Samsung died on me in just 6 months and having a problem with their costumer service, I went with a Vizio and love it.  Great picture and easy to use apps.

Reviews.Title: Great Television

Reviews.Content: This is the second one of these TV's I've purchased.  The wireless internet connection works well.  Setup is easy.  I'd recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Nice Tv & Great Price
Reviews.Author: Lynx724
Reviews.Content: Came very quickly, exactly as described. Looks great in my living room and has a lot of functionality for me to play with.

Reviews.Title: Best monitor and tv
Reviews.Author: peter siudyla
Reviews.Content: The best in its class for setup, light user freindly.Good picture moving and still.Smart side needs a good signal.I play through my pc and love it.

Reviews.Title: we loved this TV`
Reviews.Author: Hayam Shobeyri
Reviews.Content: My brother is professional game player and we ordered this TN especially for him. He is very happy with the TV. Also we can watch Netflix and Amazon directly from the TV. All the pictures are very natural and the sounds is very clear.Highly recommend this TV

Reviews.Title: satisfactory purchase
Reviews.Author: Tish
Reviews.Content: The television exceeded my expectations. There are many features that have provided me with an enjoyable viewing experience. I would recommend this television to friends.

Reviews.Title: I love my smart TV Vizio
Reviews.Author: Healthy Bunny
Reviews.Content: I don't have a very big living room so the 42 inch smart tv Vizio was perfect size. Got it in 5 days. I love the fact that I can go on Amazon directly from the tv apps or on Netflix and Woodoo for movies even log on Facebook. There is more apps to choose from. If you have this problem just ask meOverall love my tv and will recommend it to anyone
